content: wrap your little one in comfort and style with our bundles of joy skirt this simple yet timeless design is versatile enough to match any wardrobe with instructions for 8 sizes this pattern ensures a perfect fit for all little humans this skirt is more than just yarn and stitches it s a creation that will bring joy and smiles to anyone who sees it as a commitment to quality and your satisfaction this pattern is professionally edited ensuring a smooth and error-free experience **sizes** 0-3 mo waist 15 /38 cm 6-12 mo waist 16 5 /42 cm 12-18 mo waist 18 /46 cm 24 mo waist 19 5 /49 5 cm 4 y waist 21 /53 5 cm 6 y waist 22 5 /57 cm 8 y waist 24 /61 cm 10 y waist 25 5 /65 cm **level** easy ⚫⚫ includes instructions and pictures for special techniques and stitches instructions for basic techniques are available on our website **language** english standard us terms **materials required** worsted weight yarn size medium 4 crochet hook 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge scissors darning needle stitch marker measuring tape **skills required** basic stitch and technique instructions are available on our website instructions for special techniques and stitches are included in the pattern single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch bean stitch chain chain back loop only blo chainless starting single_crochet invisible join **support** don t hesitate to reach out if you encounter any issues with the pattern i am always available to assist you and answer any questions you may have throughout the process **copyright and usage** © julivia all rights reserved resell of finished product allowed pattern credit to julivia appreciated **important** this is an instant download media file no physical product will be shipped to you this item is not eligible for refund we also do not print and mail patterns
